GSP31kestprau:6: yajurvit keśavaḥ prāha kiñcit sāṃkhye yathāmati // 2 //
GSP31kestprau:14_0: tathāhi vimataṃ sukhaduḥkhamohasāmānyopādānakaṃ niyamena tadanvitasvabhāvatvāt yanniyamena
GSP31kestprau:14_1: yadanvitasvabhāvaṃ tat tatsāmānyopādānakaṃ yathā mṛtsāmānyānvitasvabhāvaṃ ghaṭaśarāvādi
GSP31kestprau:14_2: tathāhi kācana taruṇī kasyacit kāntasya sukhamutpādayati kasyacinmohaṃ kasyaciddveṣamiti
GSP31kestprau:15_0: sā ca caturviṃśatidhā prakṛteḥ prathamo mahāniti vikāraḥ pariṇāma iti yāvat mahattattvameva
GSP31kestprau:15_1: buddhitattvamityabhidhīyate ahamityahaṃkārākhyo mahattattvasya prathamo vikāraḥ tadanantaraṃ
GSP31kestprau:16: tatra mahattattvamahaṃkāratattvaṃ śabdādyāḥ pañcatanmātrā ityetat tattvasaptakaṃ prakṛtivikṛtibhāvāpannaṃ pūrvaṃ pūrvaṃ prati kāryatvamuttarottaraṃ prati kāraṇatvamityarthaḥ /
GSP31kestprau:17_0: tathāhi mahattattvaṃ mūlaprakṛteḥ kāryaṃ kāraṇaṃ cāhaṃkāratattvasya ahaṃkāratattvaṃ
GSP31kestprau:17_1: tathā mahattattvasya kāryaṃ kāraṇaṃ ca śabdatattvākhyāditanmātraṃ prati tathāhi tadapi
GSP31kestprau:17_2: pūrvaṃ prati kāryamuttaraṃ prati kāraṇaṃ ceti bodhyam /
GSP31kestprau:18: ākāśādibhūtapañcakamekādaśendriyāṇītyete punaḥ ṣoḍaśabhāvāśca prakṛtijanyā eva na tu kasyacit prakṛtiḥ tattvāntaropādānarūpatvābhāvāt /
GSP31kestprau:20: nanu viṣayāṇāṃ ghaṭādīnāṃ cetanasambandhaḥ sākṣādevāstu kiṃ mahadādipraṇālikayeti cet /
GSP31kestprau:21: tat kiṃ citireva viṣayabandhanasvabhāvā tathā sati caityanyanityatayā mokṣaḥ kadāpi na syāt /
GSP31kestprau:22: atha caitanyaṃ prakṛtau pratibimbitaṃ prakṛtiviṣayayostu sākṣāt sambandhaḥ syāt kiṃ mahadādineti cet tathāhi puruṣavannityatayā punaranirmokṣāpattireva /
GSP31kestprau:23_0: atha citirviṣayasambaddhasvabhāvā māstu viṣayā eva citisambaddhasvabhāvāḥ santu tathā
GSP31kestprau:23_1: ca viṣayatirobhāve mokṣaḥ syāditi cet tarhīdaṃ dṛṣṭamiti na syāt sarvathā citisambandhasvābhāvyenāvyavadhānāt /
GSP31kestprau:24_0: atha viṣayā indriyadvārā citisambaddhātmānaḥ santu dṛṣṭādṛṣṭavyavahārādi sannikarṣaviprakarṣābhyāmupapatsyata
GSP31kestprau:24_1: iti cenna vyāsaṅgānupapatteḥ indriyasambaddhe viṣaye jñānotpatterāvaśyakatvāt /
GSP31kestprau:25_0: atha vyāsaṅgānupapattyā manaḥ kalpyatāṃ kimahaṃkāreṇa maivaṃ evaṃ ca sati svasmin
GSP31kestprau:25_1: vyāghrohaṃ varāhohamiti nāropayet kiṃtvindriyaṃ manodvārā citisambaddhaṃ svakīyaṃ
GSP31kestprau:26_0: athaivamahaṃkārostu svapnadaśāyāmāropārthaṃ buddhitattve na mānamasti maivaṃ suṣuptyavasthāyāṃ
GSP31kestprau:26_1: manovadahaṃkāropi nivṛttavyāpāra eva tathā ca śvāsaprayojakajīvanayoniyatnasya vyāpāraḥ
GSP31kestprau:27: sambaddho viṣayo gajaturagamahiṣādiḥ puruṣeṇa caitanyena sambadhyate tata āsaṃsārabuddhitattvanāśādeva ca mokṣa iti nānirmokṣaḥ /
GSP31kestprau:28_0: akāraṇamakāryaṃ ca kūṭasthacaitanyarūpaḥ puruṣaḥ atrāyaṃ puruṣaḥ svayaṃ jyotiriti
GSP31kestprau:28_1: śrutyā tāvat svaprakāśamātmano 'bhidhīyate svaprakāśaṃ ca vijñānameva tenātmanaḥ
GSP31kestprau:29_0: na ca kṣaṇikasya jñānasya nityapuruṣātmakatvaṃ sambhavatīti jñānasya kṣaṇabhaṅguratvāsiddheḥ
GSP31kestprau:29_2: mate jñānasya kṣaṇikatve mānābhāvaḥ anyathā kālāntare 'nubhūtasmaraṇānupapattiḥ /
GSP31kestprau:30_0: na ca saṃskāro dvāraṃ tatkalpanāpekṣayā jñānasya sthairyakalpanāyāṃ lāghavāt nityatvāccāsau
GSP31kestprau:30_1: na kasyacidvikāraḥ na vā kāraṇaṃ svaprakāśatvāt yadi hi svaprakāśasyāpyasya prakṛtitvamāśrīyate
GSP31kestprau:30_3: prakṛtivikṛtibhāvopalambhāt bhedāgrahācca niṣkriyepi puruṣe kartṛtvābhimānaḥ evaṃ
GSP31kestprau:31: avidyānāmātāttvikī khyātiḥ sā ca tamoguṇodrekādāvirbhavantī viviktayostādātmyamavabhāsayati /
GSP31kestprau:35: na ca kopyasya vyāpāra iti ālocanaṃ tāvadindriyavyāpāraḥ vikalpastu manasaḥ abhimānohaṃkārasya kṛtyadhyavasāyo buddheḥ /
GSP31kestprau:36: atha kṛtyadhyavasāyaḥ kṛtimattayā jñānaṃ tatkathamacetanāyā buddheriti buddhiraṃśatrayavatī puruṣoparāgo viṣayoparāgo vyāpārāveśaśceti /
GSP31kestprau:37_0: bhavati hi mamedaṃ kartavyamiti tatra mametyaṃśaścetanasya darpaṇanirmalāyā buddheḥ
GSP31kestprau:37_1: pratibimba upadhānaṃ taccātāttvikameva caitanyena buddhervāstavasambandhābhāvāt yathā
GSP31kestprau:38_0: idamiti viṣayopadhānaṃ tacca vāstavameka indriyapraṇālikayā buddhau jñānarūpaviṣayasambandhāt
GSP31kestprau:38_1: darpaṇasyeva niḥśvāsābhihatasya malinimā pāramārthikaḥ puruṣoparāgaḥ viṣayoparāgamāhimnā
GSP31kestprau:39_0: atha jñānameva caitanyaṃ kathamanayorbheda iti ucyate kṛtyadhyavasāyalakṣaṇavyāpāraviśiṣṭā
GSP31kestprau:39_2: jñānaṃ viṣayoparāgeṇa saha yaḥ puruṣoparāgasyātāttvikaḥ sambandhaḥ sa upalabdhiḥ
GSP31kestprau:39_3: yathā darpaṇaniṣṭhā malinimā darpaṇapratibimbitamukhe dṛśyate tatheti yāvat /
GSP31kestprau:41: tadeva jñānaṃ sukhaduḥkhecchādveṣaprayatnadharmādharmarūpā aṣṭau bhāvā buddhereva ahaṃ jāne sukhītyādisāmānādhikaraṇyapratīteḥ /
GSP31kestprau:42: nanu yatraite dharmāḥ sa eva cetanaḥ kiṃ na syāditi cenna anityadharmarūpatayā pariṇāmitvāt dharmadharmiṇorabhedāt /
GSP31kestprau:43: ye punastayorbhedaṃ pratipannāstārkikaprabhṛtayaste tāvannīlo ghaṭā ityādyabhedāvagāhipratyayamapaśyanta upekṣaṇīyāḥ /
GSP31kestprau:44: nanu pradhānasyācaitanyasya kathaṃ jagatkartṛtvaṃ yat khalu nāmnā rūpeṇa ca vyākriyate taccetanakartṛkaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ yathā ghaṭādi /
GSP31kestprau:45_0: vivādādhyāsitaṃ ca jagannāmarūpeṇa vyākṛtaṃ tasmāccetanakartṛkamiti sambhāvyate cetano
GSP31kestprau:45_1: hi buddhāvālikhya nāmarūpe ghaṭā iti nāmnā rūpeṇa ca kambugrīvādinā bāhyaṃ ghaṭaṃ niṣpādayati /
GSP31kestprau:46: ata eva ghaṭasya nivartyasyāpyantaḥsaṃkalpātmanā siddhasya karmakārakabhāvo ghaṭaṃ karotīti /
GSP31kestprau:47_0: atra vadāmaḥ caitanyasya jagadupādānatve jagato jaḍatvānupapattiḥ yat kāryaṃ taccetanakartṛkamiti
GSP31kestprau:47_1: vyāptyā śarīrī kartā syāt kiṃ ca tathāpi jñānasya caitanyaviśiṣṭasya kṣityādijanakatve
GSP31kestprau:48: atha yaḥ kṛtimān sa jñānavāniti vyāptyā tatsiddhiḥ evaṃ hi yo jñānavān sa sukhītyādivyāptyā sukhamapīśvare syāt aprayojakatvaṃ cet tulyaṃ tavāpi /
GSP31kestprau:49_0: karmaiva jagatkāraṇamityapi ye pratipannāste tāvannatyantaṃ pārihartavyāḥ dharmādharmātmakārthānarthalakṣaṇacodanālakṣaṇasya
GSP31kestprau:49_1: prakṛtyabhedāt buddhyākārapariṇatāyā eva prakṛteraṣṭau bhāvā ityabhyupagamāt /
GSP31kestprau:54: athātītānāgatayoḥ kathaṃ liṅgabhāvaḥ jātyā dharmādharmātmanā tatsattvāt /
GSP31kestprau:61_0: tathāhi vimatāni śarīrāṇi svasaṃkhyāsaṃkhyeyātmavanti śarīratvāt sampratipannavat
GSP31kestprau:61_1: kiṃ caivaṃ yathaikasminneva jīvati devadatte śarīre jāte vā ceṣṭāvati vā mṛte vā
GSP31kestprau:61_2: bhāvopi jātaceṣṭāvān mṛtaḥ kileti loko vyavaharati tathā śarīrāntarepi tathaiva vyavahārāt
GSP31kestprau:62_0: ekamevādvitīyamityādiśruteśca kathañcidupacaritārthatvena tathā ātmano hi vibhuniyatvādabhinnadeśakālā
GSP31kestprau:62_1: ityekatvenocyate ajo hyeko juṣamāṇo 'nuśete jahātyenāṃ bhuktabhogāmajo 'nya ityādiśruteśca
GSP31kestprau:63_0: kiṃ punarasya prayojanaṃ niḥśreyasaṃ kiṃ tat akhilānarthamūlabhūtāyā avidyāyāḥ sattvātiśayaviśeṣāvirbhūtavidyayā
GSP31kestprau:63_1: vināśe sati tatpuruṣasya sahajacaitanyātmanāvasthānaṃ tanmokṣāparaparyāyaṃ niḥśreyasaṃ
GSP31kestprau:64: nanu prakṛternityatvāt punarapi tamodrekasambhavādavidyāvirbhāvasambhave muktipracyutiḥ syāditi /
GSP31kestprau:66: yadāhuḥ sa tu dīrghakālanairantaryasatkārasevito dṛḍhabhūmirvyutthānasaṃskāreṇa na bādhyata iti /
GSP31kestprau:67: atha nirlepasyāsya mahāpuruṣasya sambandha eva na kuto 'pavarga iti satyamāha kiṃ tu prakṛtereva bandhamokṣau puṃsyupacaryete tadāhuḥ /
GSP31kestprau:70_1: tatra jñānavyatiriktaiḥ dharmādharmādyaiḥ saptabhī rūpaiḥ prakṛtirātmanaivātmānaṃ
